Wisdom: الْغَضَبُ نَارُ الْقُلُوبِ
enWisdom: Anger is the fire of the hearts

Wisdom: الْغَضَبُ عَدُوٌّ فَلَا تُمَلِّكْهُ نَفْسَكَ
enWisdom: Anger is an enemy, so do not let it control you

Wisdom: الْحِدَّةُ ضَرْبٌ مِنَ الْجُنُونِ لِأَنَّ صَاحِبَهَا يَنْدَمُ فَإِنْ لَمْ يَنْدَمْ فَجُنُونُهُ مُسْتَحْكَمٌ
enWisdom: Rage is a bout of insanity because its possessor regrets [afterwards], but if he does not feel regret, then his insanity is firmly established

Wisdom: احْتَجِبْ عَنِ الْغَضَبِ بِالْحِلْمِ وَغُضَّ عَنِ الْوَهْمِ بِالْفَهْمِ
enWisdom: Veil [your] anger with forbearance and ignore misconceptions with understanding

Wisdom: امْلِكْ حَمِيَّةَ نَفْسِكَ وَسَوْرَةَ غَضَبِكَ وَسَطْوَةَ يَدِكَ وَغَرْبَ لِسَانِكَ وَاحْتَرِسْ فِي ذَلِكَ كُلِّهِ بِتَأْخِيرِ الْبَادِرَةِ وَكَفِّ السَّطْوَةِ حَتَّى يَسْكُنَ غَضَبُكَ وَيَثُوبَ إِلَيْكَ عَقْلُكَ
enWisdom: Control the passion of your soul, the intensity of your rage, the power of your hand and the sharpness of your tongue, and guard against all these by delaying the initiation of any action and refraining from using force until your rage subsides and you recover your senses

Wisdom: احْتَرِسُوا مِنْ سَوْرَةِ الْغَضَبِ وَأَعِدُّوا لَهُ مَا تُجَاهِدُونَهُ بِهِ مِنَ الْكَظْمِ وَالْحِلْمِ
enWisdom: Guard yourselves from the vehemence of anger, and prepare for it the restraint and forbearance that will help you fight against it

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْمِلْكِ مِلْكُ الْغَضَبِ
enWisdom: The best control is control over anger

Wisdom: أَعْظَمُ النَّاسِ سُلْطَاناً عَلَى نَفْسِهِ مَنْ قَمَعَ غَضَبَهُ وَأَمَاتَ شَهْوَتَهُ
enWisdom: The person with the greatest control over his soul is the one who subdues his anger and kills off his lustful desire

Wisdom: أَعْدَى عَدُوٍّ لِلْمَرْءِ غَضَبُهُ وَشَهْوَتُهُ فَمَنْ مَلَكَهُمَا عَلَتْ دَرَجَتُهُ وَبَلَغَ غَايَتَهُ
enWisdom: A person’s most bitter enemies are his anger and his lust, so whoever controls these two, his status is elevated and he attains his goal

Wisdom: إِنْ كَانَ فِي الْغَضَبِ الِانْتِصَارُ فَفِي الْحِلْمِ ثَوَابُ الْأَبْرَارِ
enWisdom: If in anger there is revenge, then in forbearance there is the reward of the virtuous

Wisdom: إِذَا أَبْغَضْتَ فَلَا تَهْجُرْ
enWisdom: When you have hatred [for someone] then do not disassociate yourself [completely – and leave some room for possible future friendship]

Wisdom: إِذَا تَسَلَّطَ عَلَيْكَ الْغَضَبُ فَاغْلِبْهُ بِالْحِلْمِ وَالْوَقَارِ
enWisdom: When anger comes over you, then overcome it with forbearance and dignity

Wisdom: رَأْسُ الْفَضَائِلِ مِلْكُ الْغَضَبِ وَإِمَاتَةُ الشَّهْوَةِ
enWisdom: The peak of [all] merits is controlling anger and eradicating lustful desires

Wisdom: عُقُوبَةُ الْغَضُوبِ وَالْحَقُودِ وَالْحَسُودِ تُبْدَأُ بِأَنْفُسِهِمْ
enWisdom: The punishment of the hot tempered, spiteful and jealous people starts from [within] themselves

Wisdom: لَيْسَ لِإِبْلِيسَ وَهَقٌ أَعْظَمُ مِنَ الْغَضَبِ وَالنِّسَاءِ
enWisdom: The devil has no greater lasso [to ensnare human beings with] than anger and women

Wisdom: مَنْ غَلَبَ عَلَيْهِ غَضَبُهُ وَشَهْوَتُهُ فَهُوَ فِي [مِنْ‏] حَيِّزِ الْبَهَائِمِ
enWisdom: One whose anger overpowers him is susceptible to its harm

Wisdom: مِنْ طَبَائِعِ الْجُهَّالِ التَّسَرُّعُ إِلَى الْغَضَبِ فِي كُلِّ حَالٍ
enWisdom: It is from the nature of the ignorant to get angry quickly, in every situation

Wisdom: مَا أَقْبَحَ السَّخَطَ وَأَحْسَنَ الرِّضَى
enWisdom: How ugly is displeasure and how nice pleasure is!

Wisdom: مَتَى أَشْفِي غَيْظِي إِذَا غَضِبْتُ أَ حِينَ أَعْجِزُ فَيُقَالَ لِي لَوْ صَبَرْتَ أَمْ حِينَ أَقْدِرُ فَيُقَالَ لِي لَوْ عَفَوْتَ
enWisdom: When shall I vent my anger if I get angry, is it when I am incapable (of taking revenge) and it is said to me “it is better for you to be patient” or when I have the power to (exact revenge) and it is said to me “it is better for you to forgive”?

Wisdom: لَا يَغْلِبَنَّ غَضَبُكَ حِلْمَكَ
enWisdom: Let your anger never prevail over your forbearance

Wisdom: لَا تُسْرِعَنَّ إِلَى الْغَضَبِ فَيَتَسَلَّطَ عَلَيْكَ بِالْعَادَةِ
enWisdom: Never be quick in getting angry, thereby letting it become your uncontrollable habit

Wisdom: لَا تُسْرِعَنَّ إِلَى بَادِرَةٍ وَلَا تُعَجِّلَنَّ بِعُقُوبَةٍ وَجَدْتَ عَنْهَا مَنْدُوحَةً فَإِنَّ ذَلِكَ مَنْهَكَةٌ لِلدِّينِ مُقَرِّبٌ مِنَ الْغِيَرِ
enWisdom: Never make haste in reacting harshly and never be quick to punish when there is an alternative, for this causes depletion of the faith and brings closer the transformations [of blessing into calamity]

Wisdom: لَا يَقُومُ عِزُّ الْغَضَبِ بِذُلِّ الِاعْتِذَارِ
enWisdom: The glory of anger does not match the humility of seeking pardon
